description: Declan plays soccer, works out every day and - dare we say it - has one of the sexiest, most seductive accents we’ve ever heard. When it comes to sex, the Spanish stud describes himself as “loving and hardcore at the same time”. He especially loves having his uncut dick deepthroated. Declan would like to fulfill an item on his sex wish list soon - anal! Lucky for him, we’ve got plenty of guys who could show him the ropes!
title: Declan
